rules.name: myRule_11
rules.label: Update Gantt Colour Work Direct Job Activity

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.label: Clear Gantt for Work Direct and Customer Jobs

Flow.description: Mav3rik (LMancilla) - Added colouring for Work as Direct Job Template Activity

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([ServiceAppointment].Status), ( TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Status) ="None" || TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Status) ="Scheduled" || TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Status) = "Dispatched"), TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Work_Order__r.Job_Template__r.Activity_Type__c)="Work As Directed" )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ( TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status}) ="None" || TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status}) ="Scheduled" || TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status}) = "Dispatched"), TEXT({!myVariable_current.Work_Order__r.Job_Template__r.Activity_Type__c})="Work As Directed" )

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([ServiceAppointment].Status), ( TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Status) <>"None" && TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Status) <>"Scheduled" && TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Status) <> "Dispatched"), (CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Work_Order__r.Location.Node_Type__c)), "CUSTOMER") || TEXT([ServiceAppointment].Work_Order__r.Job_Template__r.Activity_Type__c)="Work As Directed" ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ( TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status}) <>"None" && TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status}) <>"Scheduled" && TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status}) <> "Dispatched"), (CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Work_Order__r.Location.Node_Type__c})), "CUSTOMER") || TEXT({!myVariable_current.Work_Order__r.Job_Template__r.Activity_Type__c})="Work As Directed" ) )

Flow.label: TDF Service Appointment Automation
